biotools.summary:
Language workbench user interfaces for data analysis.

The Domain-Specific Language Creator by JetBrains.

Use MPS platform to create your own domain-specific language that speak to your business needs. Use non-textual notation with projectional editing.

BDVal for MPS is an MPS plugin designed to help you configure BDVal projects. BDVal for MPS makes it easier to develop and validate predictive models in high-throughput datasets.

When the product is highly complex and the developers aren’t experts in your business domain. MPS helps even unfamiliar developers understand the system immediately
